¡It\'s time to register a new activity!
You haven\'t register any activity today. ¡Register your activity now!

¡Discover HealthMate, your personalised Health Mate!


HealthMate is an app designed so as to help you improving your welfare and living a healthy lifestyle. With a vast variety of characteristics and functionalities, it offers you the possibility to manage your exercise measurements, control your eating habits, track your progress and much more.


Main features of HealthMate:


- Record your exercises: Keep a register of your physical activities, such as running, swimming, cycling, etc., for effective tracking of your exercise routine.
 - Graphs and statistics: Visualise your progress through detailed graphs and statistics, allowing you to evaluate your progress and set realistic goals.
 - Reminders and alarms: Set personalised reminders and alarms to keep you motivated and not forget your healthy habits and activities.


Download HealhMate now and start taking care of health and welfare in an easy and effective way.


¡Improve your lifestyle using HealthMate!

¡Welcome to our app!


At HealthMate, we are dedicated to providing you with a unique and enriching experience for your wellness and health. Our mission is to help you lead a healthy lifestyle by providing you with tools and resources that make achieving your goals fun and easy. 


¡Thanks for choosing us!


The HealthMate team
